author: Graig Graziosi, Graig Graziosi
title: Coronavirus: Donald Trump Jr shares racist meme depicting father as 'Kung Flu Kid'
description: The video depicts president as the Karate Kid beating up the coronavirus and China
content:
Donald Trump Jr has shared a video on Instagram in which a clip from The Karate Kid is doctored to make it appear that his father is beating up the coronavirus. 
Along with the video - in which actor Ralph Macchios head has been replaced by President Donald … [+3597 chars]
